text:
Their is no date header in the Tomcat generated response, this
is critical in case Tomcat is not running behind Apache e.g.

According to the HTTP specs (RFC 2616) the Date header MUST be
included by the origin server.
creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org

text:
This won't be addressed for Tomcat 3.2.2 but will be evaluated for a later 
release.
creator: marc.saegesser@apropos.com
marc.saegesser@apropos.com
text:
Fixed in 3.2.3.  Should appear in nightly builds starting on 7/31/01.  I'm not 
sure if the fix has been applied to 3.3 yet.  I've set the resolution to REMIND 
so that it can be picked up by the 3.3 team.

creator: nacho@apache.org
text: *** Bug 1822 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
text: This was fixed by Henri, some weeks ago. Closed since it's fixed in both 3.2 and 3.3.
